rules_text:
When this creature enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent.
Whenever you complete a bounty, target player discards a card. [i](You complete a bounty when a permanent you don't control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“An Aqualish and a Bith walk into a cantina...”
—a popular start to a joke[/i]
